hero.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
hero.subtitle: Your data is protected by industry-leading security practices, certifications, and a zero-trust architecture designed for modern enterprises.

certifications.name: SOC 2 Type II
certifications.description: Service organization controls for security, availability, and confidentiality

certifications.name: GDPR Compliant
certifications.description: Full compliance with EU General Data Protection Regulation

securityFeatures.title: End-to-End Encryption
securityFeatures.description: All data is encrypted at rest using AES-256 and in transit using TLS 1.3. Customer encryption keys are managed securely in dedicated HSMs.

securityFeatures.title: Zero Trust Architecture
securityFeatures.description: Every request is authenticated and authorized, regardless of source. No implicit trust based on network location or previous authentication.

securityFeatures.title: Row-Level Security
securityFeatures.description: Database-enforced tenant isolation ensures customers can only access their own data. Policies are enforced at the database level, not application level.

securityFeatures.title: Comprehensive Audit Logging
securityFeatures.description: Every action is logged with immutable audit trails. Logs include user identity, timestamp, action, and affected resources for full traceability.

securityFeatures.title: Enterprise SSO & MFA
securityFeatures.description: Integrate with your existing identity provider via SAML 2.0 or OIDC. Multi-factor authentication is enforced for all accounts.

securityFeatures.title: Role-Based Access Control
securityFeatures.description: Granular permissions system allows fine-grained control over who can access what. Custom roles can be created to match your organization's structure.

securityFeatures.title: Continuous Vulnerability Scanning
securityFeatures.description: Automated security scanning runs continuously across our infrastructure and codebase. Vulnerabilities are triaged and remediated based on severity.

securityFeatures.title: Regular Penetration Testing
securityFeatures.description: Third-party security firms conduct annual penetration tests. Findings are remediated and verified before the next assessment.

securityFeatures.title: Automated Backups & Recovery
securityFeatures.description: Continuous backups with point-in-time recovery. Data is replicated across multiple geographic regions for disaster resilience.

securityFeatures.title: 24/7 Security Monitoring
securityFeatures.description: Our security operations center monitors for threats around the clock. Automated detection and response systems provide rapid incident containment.

securityFeatures.title: Privacy by Design
securityFeatures.description: Privacy considerations are built into every feature from the start. Data minimization, purpose limitation, and user consent are core principles.

securityFeatures.title: AI Guardrails & Transparency
securityFeatures.description: All AI decisions include confidence scores and explanations. Human-in-the-loop controls ensure AI augments rather than replaces human judgment.

trustCenter.title: Trust Center
trustCenter.description: Access our security documentation, compliance reports, and certifications.
